Generation IV.Diamond: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
Generation IV.Pearl: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
Generation IV.Platinum: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario , since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario , since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.

Generation V.Black: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
Generation V.White: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.
Generation V.Black 2: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
Generation V.White 2: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

Generation VI.X: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
Generation VI.Y: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

Generation VII.Sun: Black streaks all over its body show where its auras and the energy of Mega Evolution intermingled and raced through it.
Generation VII.Moon: It readies itself to face its enemies by focusing its mental energies. Its fighting style can be summed up in a single word: heartless.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Its aura has expanded due to Mega Evolution. Governed only by its combative instincts, it strikes enemies without mercy.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.

Generation VIII.Sword: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.
Generation VIII.Shield: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokémon's trust.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: By sensing the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway beings. I have given the name “aura” to this power.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.
Generation IX.Violet: A well-trained one can use its aura to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

Generation VI.X: Received from Korrina in the Tower of Mastery Evolve Riolu
Generation VI.Y: Received from Korrina in the Tower of Mastery Evolve Riolu
